name: Coordinate Transforms
description: Coordinate transforms are used to transform the coordinate system of a shape.

coord.description: The coord method is used to specify the coordinate transform of a layer.
coord.example: layer({ coord: clock() }, [chart(seafood).flow(spread('lake', { dir: 'x' })).mark(rect({ h: 'count' })); chart(seafood).flow(spread('lake', { dir: 'x' })).mark(rect({ h: 'count' }));]).render(root, { w: 500, h: 300 });

arcLengthPolar.description: An arc length polar coordinate transform.
